en:
Looking for a relaxing break? Want to take a moment just for yourself? Do you want to let go?
SO'ZEN C√¥te d'Opale can answer your desire?
On Friday November 25th 22
a relaxation session (yoga nidra).
from 5:15 pm to 6:30 pm
in St Martin-Boulogne (Bad'Huit)

The yoga nidra is a technique of intense relaxation which is practised lying down and which acts on all the body at the physical, mental, emotional level...
It has many benefits: improvement of the quality of sleep, management of fatigue and stress, emotions, letting go...
